May Allen

Born: October 3, 1888 (4, 5)

Birthplace: Rockford, Winnebago County, Illinois (4, 5)

Mother: Sarah Sheffield (4, 5)

Father: William Allen (4, 5)

Husband: Robert Collins (2, 3, 5)

Married: March 21, 1914 (2)

Marriage Place: Lake County, Indiana (2)

Direct Descendant: Roberta Collins (3, 5)

Death: November 21, 1934 (4, 5)

Death Place: Rockford, Winnebago County, Illinois (4, 5)

Burial: November 23, 1934 (4, 5)

Burial Place: Greenwood Cemetery, Rockford, Winnebago County, Illinois (4, 5)
